short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Got a virtual party? Clichik will take care of taking screenshots while you enjoy you party!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Clichik will take screenshots while you enjoy you virtual party! Just select the application (e.g zoom) and for every 5min a new screenshot is taken. You really need not worry about a thing!
